report_title: KJET Lamu County Application Ranking and Evaluation

applications.applicant_name: Witu Expert Building and Construction Association

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Association operational and registered for at least 3 years (Score 5).

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Consistent orders to local contractors/retailers; multi-channel sales (Score 4).

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear problem/solution (bricks/tiles manufacturing); quantified performance targets; detailed short/mid/long-term plans; co-investment ready (Score 5).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Construction); fills critical manufacturing/material node (Score 5).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Strong inclusion (>30% women on board, 37% women, 38% youth); 1-2 green practices (plastic recycling into tiles) (Score 4).

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Association operational and registered for at least 3 years (Score 5).

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Strong plan for equipment acquisition; quantified target (50% production increase) (Score 4).

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Priority VC (Textiles); fills critical manufacturing/value addition node (Score 5).

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Strong inclusion (70% women, 60% youth); 1-2 green practices (repurposing offcuts) (Score 4).
